typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		step as integer,
		type as string,
		amount as double,
		nameOrig as string,
		oldbalanceOrg as double,
		newbalanceOrig as double,
		nameDest as string,
		oldbalanceDest as double,
		newbalanceDest as double,
		isFraud as integer,
		isFlaggedFraud as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'bronze',
	folderPath: 'archive.zip') ~> source1
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
Join1 aggregate(groupBy(type,
		step),
	payment_agg = approxDistinctCount('{payment}')) ~> Aggregate1
source1, source2 join(type == Column_1,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		type as string,
		payment_agg as long
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
